snippet: Jean-Claude Juncker, the departing leader of the group of ministers who oversee the euro, criticized northern Europeans for demanding austerity budgets from their southern neighbors.
lead_paragraph: Jean-Claude Juncker, the departing leader of the group of ministers who oversee the euro, criticized northern Europeans for demanding austerity budgets from their southern neighbors.

headline.main: Sharp Words From European Minister for Countries in North
headline.print_headline: Luxembourg Leader Criticizes Europe’s Northern Members
